name: Ancient Mayan Civilization
description:
Ancient Mayan Civilization

Survival inside the pyramid also tried to discover archaeological places and a live exit from the pyramid

Story:

A group of explorers entered an ancient pyramid, tried to explore hidden secrets and some ancient treasures and tried to avoid traps
